Package org.uma.jmetal.component.selection.impl

Class PopulationAndNeighborhoodMatingPoolSelection<S extends Solution<?>>

java.lang.Object
org.uma.jmetal.component.selection.impl.PopulationAndNeighborhoodMatingPoolSelection<S>
Type Parameters:
S - Type of the solutions
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatingPoolSelection<S>
public class PopulationAndNeighborhoodMatingPoolSelection<S extends Solution<?>> extends Object implements MatingPoolSelection<S>
This class allows to select N different solutions that can be taken from a solution list (i.e, population or swarm) or from a neighborhood according to a given probability.
Author:
Antonio J. Nebro
